listDevices.description: Enable(1)/Disable(0) display devices available, default is 1.

expTime_us.description: Manually set exposure time in uS, only work when auto-exposure is disabled, default is 30000 uS.

expTimeMax_us.description: Maximum exposure time, in uS, work when auto-exposure is enabled, default is 100000 uS.

triggerFrequency_Hz.description: Image capture frame rate (Hz), default is 10.

nImagePairs.description: Number of image pairs to acquire, default is 0(continuous).

outdir.description: Image Output directory. Change Default value to your desired directory.

writeLogEnabled.description: Enable(1)/Disable(0) Logging to file. Default is 1.

bmpEnabled.description: Storage to BMP files enabled.0-save png file, 1-save bmp file. Default is 0.

imageThreads.description: Number of threads for image storage. Default is 6.

gnssPortname.description: GNSS Receiver Portname, DO NOT SUPPORT NOW. Default is /dev/ttyACM0.

samplingMode.description: Sampling Mode only for monocular capture: 1-with external borad, 2-standalone. Default is 2.

autoSave.description: automatical save image(1) or manual save image(0), default is 1.
